Header: Fishing Community Seeks Solutions to their Issues
Content: Fishing communities in Koddeikaddiyarkulam, Akkarayankulam, Anavilandankulam and Ambalaperumalkulam areas, served by Kilinochchi Security Forces in the Northern Province on Sunday (16), together with Major General K.A.W Kumarapperuma, General Officer Commanding - 65 Division, met Major General Vijitha Ravipriya, Commander Security Forces - Kilinochchi in order to discuss matters of concern to their industry. During the discussions, those people highlighted the issues they are facing due to lease of irrigation tanks to outside businessman and the need for more fishing equipment plus the approval to do their fishing in the sea during off seasons.
